dc_title_s: Cram's railroad & township map of Minnesota.
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:1,203,840]. 19 miles to an in. Covers northern Iowa, western Wisconsin, and central and southern Minnesota between Cass County and the southern border. Relief shown by hachures. Shows Minnesota counties, cities and towns, railroads, and extent of surveyed townships with Public Land Survey coordinates. At upper right: "Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1876, by G.F. Cram, in the Office of the Librarian of Congress at Washington, D.C." 52 x 41 cm
dc_publisher_sm: Geo. F. Cram, proprietor of the Western Map Depot
